name: Persona 4 GB [DEMO]
description:
CONTROLS

Gameboy | PC

START | ENTER -Start the game

A  | J  - Interact

B | K - Back/Run

DPAD | WASD - Movement/Menu controls

[IF PLAYING ON EMULATOR, CONTROLS MAY VARY]

EXPERIENCE THE HIT CLASSIC JRPG SERIES NOW ON THE GAMEBOY!

Ever wonder what Persona 4 would look like if it was released on the gameboy? Well now you don't need to, as a reimagining of what a gameboy Persona 4 might be like comes to reality and on actual hardware with the rom file attached below. 

This project was made with the GB Studio engine, a free engine that lets you create your own gameboy games, and Persona 4 GB was actually one of my first projects using the engine! This demo only lets you play the very beginning Persona 4, and has around 5-15 ish minutes of play time. This isn't the full game of Persona 4 on gameboy, and is only a demo of what Persona 4 might be like if it was developed and released earlier on the gameboy. I hope you enjoy this fun little project that I had worked on over a year ago, and who knows, maybe I'll post some updates in the future! (maybe even follow my itch or twitter to find out wink wink nudge nudge) 

-SeanSS

MUSIC CHIPTUNE CREDITS
